meanings.definition: The flesh of an animal, especially a sheep or goat, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The gosht was tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: We cooked the gosht with spices and herbs.
meanings.sent3: The gosht made everyone at the table smile.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the gosht filled the kitchen like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The juicy gosht melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: A dish made with this meat.
meanings.sent1: The gosht curry was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the gosht biryani for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The gosht dish looked like a work of art on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The gosht dish was a symphony of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the gosht dish lingered in the room long after it was eaten.
